participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, always eager to help others.
participant_1.background: for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and quirky, always looking for new experiences.
participant_2.background: i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i love cats and have two cats. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

content.text: Whazzup? i like to go to the beach and listen to music
